recommendations: “It has been four year since I have known Karan, as both, a friend and colleague. I have had the pleasure to work with him on numerous occasions. His essential characteristics are patience, being a great team player and the ability to go beyond his role to help the team. His performance was very worthy. He is hardworking, ready for challenges and has strong communication skills. His input on various projects such as the Brokers Hub Restuarant and the Business Typhoons Hydroponics Plan has been highly valuable to the process be it as a co-worker or a leader. Being his colleague and friend, I strongly believe that Karan has the capability of being an asset for any company he works for.” Show less

“I have had the pleasure to teach Karan Finance related courses during the course of his BA Accountancy & Finance Degree studies at Heriot Watt University. Karan is a pleasure to teach. He is of a very mature disposition and grasps concepts quickly. He loves his studies and is very tenacious executing whatever duties are assigned to him. He is a very good team player, who easily adopts a leadership role whenever placed in a group environment. Whilst he easily gels with others in a team environment, he can work individually when expected and would I would highly recommend him to anyone who wants to hire an honest, hard working young man. ” Show less
